text: Kazimierz Zygfryd Barburski (7 August 1942 - 26 May 2016) was a Polish fencer. He won a bronze medal in the team épée event at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Łódź, Poland. Barburski died on 26 May 2016 in Poland, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Polish fencers Category:Medalists at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Łódź Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland
title: Kazimierz Barburski
